name: vcarpool
description: Carpool management application with TypeScript backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:fast: npm run build:shared && concurrently "npm run build:backend" "npm run build:frontend"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:backend:ci && npm run test:frontend:ci
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix && eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx --fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.security:scan: npm audit --audit-level moderate && npm run security:secrets
scripts.func:start:ci: cd backend && npx azure-functions-core-tools@4 start --javascript --cors * | cat
scripts.analyze: cd backend && node -e "const CodeOrganizationManager = require('./dist/src/utils/code-organization.js').default; const manager = new CodeOrganizationManager('.'); manager.analyzeArchitecture().then(report => console.log(JSON.stringify(report, null, 2)));"
scripts.coverage:report: npm run test:backend:ci && npm run test:frontend:ci && node scripts/merge-coverage.js
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test:ci
scripts.validate:fast: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.validate:full: npm run validate:fast && npm run validate:e2e && npm run security:scan
scripts.validate:e2e: cd e2e && npm run start:services && sleep 10 && npm run test:e2e && npm run stop:services || (npm run stop:services && exit 1)
scripts.husky:setup: npm run husky:install && npx husky add .husky/pre-commit 'npm run validate:fast' && npx husky add .husky/pre-push 'npm run validate:e2e'

author: Ved Prakash Mishra
